name: OrientDB
description: OrientDB is the first Multi Model DBMS with Document & Graph engine
summary: OrientDB is a 2nd Generation Distributed Graph Database with the flexibility of Documents in one product with an Open Source commercial friendly license (Apache 2 license). First generation Graph Databases lack the features that Big Data demands: multi-master replication, sharding and more flexibility for modern complex use cases.
scenario: When you need a versatile graph database that you can use also for other stuff
